scripts.seed:refresh: EXPORT_PREFIX=${EXPORT_PREFIX:-gs://pletcher-portfolio-app.firebasestorage.app/firestore-exports} && LATEST=$(gsutil ls -d "$EXPORT_PREFIX/*" | tail -n 1) && echo "Downloading seed: $LATEST" && rm -rf ../.databases/imports/firestore && mkdir -p ../.databases/imports/firestore && gsutil -m cp -r "$LATEST" ../.databases/imports/firestore/
scripts.serve: npm run emulators:kill && npm run env:java -- npx firebase-tools emulators:start --only functions,firestore --config ../../firebase.json
scripts.serve:seeded: npm run emulators:kill && (test -d ../.databases/imports/firestore || npm run seed:refresh) && SEED_DIR=$(npm run -s seed:path) && echo "Importing Firestore from: $SEED_DIR" && npm run env:java -- npx firebase-tools emulators:start --only functions,firestore --config ../../firebase.json --project pletcher-portfolio-app --import "$SEED_DIR"
scripts.serve:aio: npm run emulators:kill && npm run seed:refresh && SEED_DIR=$(npm run -s seed:path) && echo "Importing Firestore from: $SEED_DIR" && npm run env:java -- npx firebase-tools emulators:start --only functions,firestore --config ../../firebase.json --project pletcher-portfolio-app --import "$SEED_DIR"
scripts.functions:shell: npm run env:java -- npx firebase-tools functions:shell --config ../../firebase.json
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run env:java -- npx firebase-tools deploy --only functions --config ../../firebase.json
scripts.logs:functions: npm run env:java -- npx firebase-tools functions:log --config ../../firebase.json
